title: Just hit 48% winrate on my main champ...
body:
That I got to diamond on last year, and am struggling against golds, because I can't even walk up to minions to cs. 
When I hit 45% I guess it will be time to find a new champ to play. Cause as much as I like free losses, it will be time to win some. 

So this is how those 40% nunu mains felt.

replies.body: Does this count as spam yet?  If you are not willing to look for ways to improve then why are you pretending to be better than you are?
How do you improve getting one shot before being able to even touch the enemy?
You build defensive items.  Don't half ass it.  This is why I use Trancendance and Gathering Storm, it let's me build everything tank and still deal surprising damage.

Yep build def vs a lvl 2-3 Zoe who does 70% of your HP in two spells

How much gold do you have at lvl 2-3?
You'll get better eventually.  As long as you are not respecting her attack angles it won't matter what items you have.
